title: These noise-cancelling earbuds are just $23 through October 15
description:
We could all use a set of earbuds as part of our everyday carry. And you don’t have to break the bank to get a great pair. During our version of Prime Day, Deal Days, you can get the Flux 7 TWS Earbuds with Wireless Charging Case & Power Bank for more than half off at just $22.97.

The Flux 7s are truly wireless and use Bluetooth to pair with your phone instantly. They use advanced noise-reduction technology to block out distractions around you so you can focus on the task at hand, and are IPX4 waterpro
